message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still higher than my budget. I'm willing to go up to $90, which is a fair price for both of us. Let's make a deal!

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $98. It's still a good deal for both of us, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
